education.title: Microsoft Certified - AI-900, AZ-900
education.details: AI-900 Azure AI Fundamentals, AZ-900 Azure Fundamentals

experiences.title: Graduate Trainee - Network Automation Engineer
details: Rebuilt Web UI for internal network automation tool using a mix of Vanilla JS & React for better developer usability across teams. Developed a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing & deployment of the application to test and production environments.
Developed an interactive, 3D global network map with Mapbox & Three.js for real-time infrastructure visibility.
Implemented high-speed search indexing/caching solution for network data of 12M+ devices using pola.rs, improving search speed 120x.
Built dynamic, modular, reusable UI components (React) for use in highly customisable, panel based workspace platforms.
Integrated AI tools (Copilot, Cursor) into personal workflows to improve productivity.

experiences.title: Web Developer
details: Maintenance & improvement of existing systems in Perl, PSQL, & Template Toolkit. Development of new features in modern JavaScript frameworks (Svelte, React, Express)
Process management & deployment of non-containerised microservices to Linux based servers.

experiences.title: Software Developer Intern
details: Developed scalable scripts scanning 10B+ rows of AWS S3; achieved ~$4K monthly savings. Automated S3 lifecycle + policy changes via Terraform & Atlantis.
